> CLUBBEBE

> CLUBBEBE MEMBER & INSIDER FREE STANDARD SHIPPING: For a limited time, clubbebe members at Insider level and below are eligible for free standard shipping on any bebe.com order shipped to a physical address in the United States. Excludes Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands and all other shipping destinations outside the United States. Shipping and handling charges will be deducted automatically at checkout for qualifying orders when customer selects standard shipping. Valid on bebe.com only. Not valid at bebe stores, at bebe outlet stores or on bebeoutlets.com. Not valid on gift cards, orders shipped to P.O. Boxes or previous purchases. Subject to adjustment due to returns, cancellations and exchanges. Other restrictions may apply. Offer expires 1/31/17 at 11:59 pm PST.

CLUBBEBE ELITE FREE STANDARD SHIPPING: clubbebe Elite members are eligible for free standard shipping on any bebe.com order shipped to a U.S. address. Free standard shipping to clubbebe Elite members provided by bebe stores is available in the U.S., Puerto Rico and Canada. On bebe.com, shipping and handling charges will be deducted automatically at checkout for qualifying orders when customer selects standard shipping. Valid on bebe.com and at bebe stores only. Offer not valid on bebeoutlets.com or at bebe outlet stores. Offer not valid on previous purchases. Subject to adjustment due to returns, cancellations and exchanges. Other restrictions may apply. Offer subject to change at any time. Offer valid for one year from the date on which customer reached clubbebe Elite status.

CLUBBEBE ICON FREE EXPRESS SHIPPING: clubbebe Icon members are eligible for free express shipping on any bebe.com order shipped to a U.S. address. Free express shipping to clubbebe Icon members provided by bebe stores is available in the U.S., Puerto Rico and Canada. On bebe.com, shipping and handling charges will be deducted automatically at checkout for qualifying orders when customer selects express shipping. Valid on bebe.com and at bebe stores only. Offer not valid on bebeoutlets.com or at bebe outlet stores. Offer not valid on previous purchases. Subject to adjustment due to returns, cancellations and exchanges. Other restrictions may apply. Offer subject to change at any time. Offer valid for one year from the date on which customer reached clubbebe Icon status.

CLUBBEBE FREE RETURNS: For a limited time, clubbebe members are eligible for free return shipping on any bebe.com order shipped to a U.S. address. Excludes Puerto Rico, the U.S. Virgin Islands and all other shipping destinations outside the United States. Return charges will be deducted when returned order is received by bebe.com. Valid on bebe.com only. Not valid on purchases from bebe stores, bebe outlet stores or bebeoutlets.com. Not valid on previous purchases. Other restrictions may apply. Offer subject to change at any time. Offer only valid on orders placed between 1/1/17 12:01 am PST and 1/31/17 11:59 pm PST.

INSTAGRAM CONTEST: No purchase necessary. Each week, one (1) winner will receive a $250 bebe gift card (ARV: US $250.00) and have his or her winning photo featured on Sponsor's social media channels. Total ARV of all prizes is Two Hundred and Fifty Dollars (US $250.00). To enter via computer and for official rules, including complete judging criteria, visit https://bebebabe.hscampaigns.com and follow instructions to submit an entry. All eligible entries received will be judged by Sponsor on a weekly basis based on the following criteria: overall style, image quality and aesthetic appeal. The entry with the highest scores for the week will be deemed the potential winner. In the event of a tie, an additional, \

judge will determine the winner(s) based on the criteria listed herein. Odds of winning depend on number of eligible entries received and relative skill of the entrants. All entries for the week can be submitted starting Friday at 12:00 am PST and must be received by Thursday at 11:59 pm PST. The winner for each week will be announced on Friday by 6:00 pm PST. Open to legal residents of the United States/D.C. (excluding Rhode Island), ages 18 or older, except employees of sponsors, their immediate families and those living in the same household. Void outside the 50 United States/D.C. and where prohibited. Sponsor: bebe stores, inc.
